name: Long Fist and Southern Fist
description: Master both the extended-range strikes of Long Fist and the powerful stances of Southern Fist.

cards.title: Long Fist Combination
cards.description: A flowing series of extended strikes and evasive maneuvers.
bulletpoints: Keep strikes loose yet controlled for maximum reach
Incorporate low stances for balance and fluidity
Ensure quick recovery for the next movement
cards.summaryText: Whip the long fist combo from deep stances so each reach snaps back ready for the next line.

cards.title: Southern Fist Power Strike
cards.description: A rooted, explosive strike emphasizing strength and impact.
bulletpoints: Generate power from the hips and core
Keep a low, stable stance for balance
Focus on decisive execution with each movement
cards.summaryText: Sink the stance, drive from the hips, and drop the southern fist with decisive weight.
